q: of March. The automaker is going ahead with fuel efficiency projects, expecting it will receive the loan to help pay for them.`` I can't stop the machine,'' Sergio Marchionne said recently. So far, I have been able to manage it without the loan, but there will come a point in time when I have to go into the kitty and use other cash for this.'' According href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html"> to Eric Schmidt : Larry Page will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. Mr Eamon Gilmore today claimed European Central Bank president Jean-Claude Trichet is a civil servant who will go along with any renegotiation of the deal. He's a very important European civil servant and any civil servant will of course always stick to the plan that is there at the moment, just as he will stick to the plan that is renegotiated when it is renegotiated, Mr Eamon Gilmore told RT. Meanwhile, Labour education spokesman Ruairi Quinn said today a Labour government would not unilaterally tear up the EU-IMF deal.
